workflow.description: Kreira PO Approval i siri se na onoliko approvera koliko je odabrano na PO. Svaki approver odobrava nezavisno od ostalih.
workflow.name: RSM : Purchase Order Approval

initcondition.formula: "Approver 1 Status" NOT IN ("Approval Status1") AND isEmpty("Approver 1") = 'F'
"Approver 2 Status" NOT IN ("Approval Status1") AND isEmpty("Approver 2") = 'F'
"Approver 3 Status" NOT IN ("Approval Status1") AND isEmpty("Approver 3") = 'F'
"Računovođa Status" NOT IN ("Approval Status1") AND isEmpty("Računovođa") = 'F'
isEmpty("Računovođa") = 'F' AND "Računovođa Status" NOT IN ("Approval Status1")
